name: riotgear
description: The open source component library for RiotJS

scripts.tags: for D in $(find tags -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d) ; do rm -rf $D/dist ; riot $D $D/dist/$(basename $D).js --type es6 ; cat $D/*.js >> $D/dist/$(basename $D).js ; babel $D/dist --out-dir $D/dist ; done ;
scripts.uglify: for D in $(find tags -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d) ; do uglifyjs --mangle --compress --screw-ie8 --output $D/dist/$(basename $D).min.js $D/dist/$(basename $D).js ; done ;
scripts.build: npm run dev && npm run uglify && npm run test

author: Gregory Pratt
